::Scorponok/Zarak::

Remus' attack left no time to react. The missile blasted Scorponok in the chest and sent the massive Decepticon falling backwards. The head was knocked lose and ejected from the body, transforming to Zarak.

Zarak: That was nice, Maximal. You proved yourself by damaging Scorponok. Unfortunately he is still functional!

Zarak leaps up as Scorponok transforms to scorpion mode. Zarak lands on top. Scorponok turns swinging his tail at Remus like a massive whip or bat.

 evident trace of his bad condition to Razorwing. When he was close
 ehngouh, he fired one last shot of his missile from his good arm at
